text: Nigel Boocock (17 September 1937 – 3 April 2015) was a British speedway rider. He appeared in eight Speedway World Championship finals and was a reserve in one other (1962).Bamford, R. & Shailes, G. (2002). A History of the World Speedway Championship. Stroud: Tempus Publishing. Boocock was born in Wakefield, West Riding of Yorkshire, England. Boocock died on 3 April 2015 in Queensland, Australia, aged 77."Nigel Boocock 1937–2015", speedwaygb.co, 3 April 2015. title: Nigel Boocock
